website_summaries.verdict: A sweet, inexpensive, and thoughtful little gift set of owl candles that are better at cutely perching on a shelf, instead of lighting up a room.
pros: Each owl sports a unique and colorful design
Packages are topped with a gift tag and white ribbon
cons: These candles are more for decor than burning

customer_reviews.title: Too cute to burn
customer_reviews.text: These candles are adorable! I have a friend who is an owl fanatic and she loved them! They are packaged in the little clear boxes as pictured. They are very small but will make great little decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Candj

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted these to a friend who loves owls, she loved them! They are tiny and cute. When opening the box it’s as though the owls are looking up at whomever opens the box, perfect presentation for a small gift.
customer_reviews.author: E Castro

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my friend who is obsessed with owls and she absolutely loved them. They come in the little boxes as shown in the picture. I don't know how well they burn, since my friend probably won't actually light them, but they are very cute little candles for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Give a hoot and buy them. Be wise all you owl collectors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cute little owls for my sister. She loves owls. The only problem is now she won't light them. She just wants to have them on a shelf! Now I will have to buy her another owl gift. Hopefully one she will use. Price is great and a great collection addition.
customer_reviews.author: kittylover

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are just like the picture. They come very well protected in a box and individually packed.
customer_reviews.author: TanMartz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave these out as favors for my baby shower. They were adorable
customer_reviews.author: r.michelle

customer_reviews.title: Small but Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but much smaller than I expected. I bought them for my owl themed baby shower to use as party favors.
customer_reviews.author: TekWho

customer_reviews.title: Cute little candles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who loves candles. I put them in a basket with a bunch of other things but these were really cute and made really nice. They look just like the picture but are a bit smaller than I thought they would be. The workmanship on them was really done well and they looked really nicely done. A really cute gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my sister's baby shower & she loved them! Got compliments on how cute they were too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer or small gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be used as stocking stuffers. They were adorable and brought smiles to several faces, but note, when burned, they make quite a mess with the wax. Be sure to place them over a plate of some kind to ensure the wax is caught
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a baby shower gift! They're tied with thin ribbon already in a cute plastic gift box which is adorable on its own, but I did tie an extra ribbon around it with a homemade matching tag thanking guests. Very cute for any owl-themed party favor! And much better deal than buying them in Party City or any other store.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured. Haven't burned them, just used as decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and tiny
customer_reviews.text: So cute and tiny! I bought them for my sister because she loves owls.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: very cute, got for mom we use them decoratively and don't actually light them, beware they are small though, picture can be deceiving
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandnother for christmas because she loves owls and she loves them! Wont even light them cause there so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: My friend loves owls so I bought this as part of her gift! It looks cheaply made, but once it burns, I guess it doesn't really matter. Still kinda cute! She hasn't said anything bad about them :)
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but super small. I would not have ordered if I knew they were that tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Ken McClellan

customer_reviews.title: ... part of a Christmas gift for my mom she loved them. Said they were to cute to light ...
customer_reviews.text: Got as part of a Christmas gift for my mom she loved them. Said they were to cute to light and that shes going to use them as decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Owls!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my son's 1st Birthday Party and it's SUPER ADORABLE! We can take the bottom lid off so it's easy to be placed on top of your cake. Absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: ShopaholicMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift and they seemed to really love them. So that's enough for me.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable party favors
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! They worked great for party favors and everyone loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Cute little owls
customer_reviews.text: Absoulty darling got it as a gift for my owl loving friend she loved them

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for owl lovers
customer_reviews.text: Very cute owl candles. My friend who loves owls loved this gift. A must buy for owl lovers.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These candles were perfect for my daughters owl themed cake. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I think they are adorable and should be good favors at my baby shower
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Came quickly, but they are a little smaller then I thought they would be. Still, I think they are adorable and should be good favors at my baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they look nice, but a bit too small
customer_reviews.text: they look nice, but a bit too small. I guess it is my fault that I did not read the dimensions very well. but still, thanks for quick delivery and nice looking (little) candles

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: Nice favor for a shower that ha s an owl them. Just added some Lindt chocolates to the gift box.

customer_reviews.title: Too cute to burn!
customer_reviews.text: SO adorable! My friend collects owls so I got these for her. She didn't burn them so I can't review on anything other than looks.
customer_reviews.author: sjm1203

customer_reviews.title: They're very small
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I thought they would be. But I like it because my mom can set them on her nightstand.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and pictured.. super adorable. I'll probably use them as decorations instead of burning them.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little Owls!
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable I didn't want to light them! But I did and they lasted as long as I want and I can use them again. very happy with these!

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness
customer_reviews.text: I love owls. Got these and I am using them for decorations only. Haha! Never going to light them. They are so cute!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I had this shipped to my girlfriends office just to say hi. She loves them! She keeps a couple at work and a couple at home.

customer_reviews.title: Owl Candles
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. They're a little smaller than I had imagined they'd be, but that's my own fault for not reading the specs in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Too tiny :(
customer_reviews.text: These candles are super adorable. I couldn't resist getting these for my boyfriend as a Valentine's present! Too bad these are freaken tiny. Still can't help how cute they are defiantly not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got these as favors for a baby shower and they were a hit. Extremely cute and can't go wrong for the price when you get 4 of these. Ended up buying 6 sets. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RuhyN

customer_reviews.title: Way too small for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Cute but way too small for the price! It should be half the cost they are selling it for.
customer_reviews.author: iamgingervitus

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute candles. I bought them for my daughter's 1st Birthday cake and they were just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KaJuZo

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Cute addition to the decorations for my niece's "owl" themed baby shower -- and she'll get to take these adorable candles home as a keepsake. Nicely detailed, bright colors, cute packaging. Perfect. :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan S. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are just too cute! And yes, they are small but honestly after you see how cute these are that wont matter!

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter's first birthday cake. the theme was....you guessed it, owls. They were so cute and I had others asking me where I found them.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute candles! I'm using my dad's old account & I got this for my mom's birthday tomorrow. Any owl lover will adore this set.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a baby shower favor gift, cake has the same owl as a decoration so I got this candles. They are really cute - not sure how they smell.

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than you may think!!! So cute!!

customer_reviews.text: Wife loved them and was very happy. I thought they were on the small side, but a great buy for the price.

customer_reviews.title: these r so cute and adorable I wish I could buy more I'm giving them ...

customer_reviews.text: Cute gifts, a great value...warning: too adorable to burn. :)

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Gifted to a friend that adores owls and she loved them!

customer_reviews.text: So cute! The detailing is also amazing. They're individually wrapped. I used them as gifts for my friends who love owls - a perfect stocking stuffer

customer_reviews.title: Great party decorations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as table decorations for my son's woodland forest birthday party. They are adorable, and I can never see myself burning them. They cost a little more than I wanted to pay; however, I did not find them cheaper anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: MLM2

customer_reviews.title: cutest baby owl
customer_reviews.text: I got for my friend, she loves the owls. I'm sure cutest baby owl will looks great in her office...

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bill!
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I was looking for! They are quite small and will be perfect for my project, which I won't disclose for security reasons. I will not be burning them, though...

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughters first birthday party as decorations and prizes. They are super cute! Everyone loved them. I have not burned one so I couldn't tell you how well they burn. I just want them as decoration to look cute.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These candles are extremely cute and I am very happy with the way they look....
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed some candles for my daughters birthday cake. When I got these I thought that they weren't going to work because of the tea light base. I was able to pop that off and took it a step further and was able to easily remove the base of the candle. The owls fit perfectly on top of the cake and it was adorable! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Raphael

product_meta.title: Kate Aspen Set of 4 Assorted Candle, Whooo's The Cutest Baby Owl
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1NOTE: This is an assorted product; color and print advertised are subjected to vary.
It's hard to decide whooo's the cutest of these four owlets one face is as cute as the next. Each one's feathers are a different color, and every color pops. But they're all here for the same reason you are to celebrate a new arrival whooo's really the cutest. Features and facts: Set of four baby owl candle favors in an array of cool colors, like tangerine, lemon yellow, chocolate brown and turquoise; the owlets have lovable, sweet faces and a wick on the top of their heads. Candle measures approximately 1 3/4" h x 1 1/4" in diameter. Clear display gift presentation includes the base with a tree branch graphic, a white satin ribbon and bow, and a leaf shaped for you tag. Gift box measures 2 1/4" h x 1 3/4" w x 1 3/4" d. Sold in sets of four assorted.
feature_bullets: Set of four baby owl candle favors in an array of cool colors, like tangerine, lemon yellow, chocolate brown and turquoise, the owlets have lovable, sweet faces and a wick on the top of their heads
Candle measures approximately 1 3/4" h x 1 1/4" in diameter; Clear display gift presentation includes the base with a tree branch graphic, a white satin ribbon and bow, and a leaf shaped for you tag
Gift box measures 2 1/4" h x 1 3/4" w x 1 3/4" d; Sold in sets of four assorted
